name: Coloren - Color by Number
description:
Looking to relax or unwind? It's coloring book time. Coloren combines fun, stress reduction, and beautiful art into one awesome app.
The app goes above and beyond to bring users a premier coloring experience. Check out these powerful features:
- Enormous variety of beautiful artwork, including Animals, People, Landscapes, Mandalas and more.
- Simple controls, smooth interface, and eye catching notifications
- New artwork added daily
- Library of more than 1000 works, all free to use
- Editor's Choice: popular works suggested for you
- Tips and tricks throughout the app to help you create flawless artwork
Coloren is here for you. Whether you want a brief distraction, some relaxation, or just to kill time, take a moment to create a masterpiece. You won't regret it. Try Coloren today.

Terms of Service: http://colorgame.life/TermsOfService.html
Privacy Policy: http://colorgame.life/PrivacyPolicy.html
